programme.title: Transformerid: Valjasuremine
programme.desc: Inimkond loob kaed pearahakutiga, et tabada Optimus Prime. Autobotid poorduvad mehaaniku pere poole, et abi saada.

programme.title: Kõuekargatus
programme.desc: 2055. aastal on ajas randamine tõeks saanud. Igauks saab nuud dinosaurustele kulla minna, kuid uks ettevaatamatu samm minevikus muudab taielikult tulevikku...

programme.title: Põgenemine Pretoriast
programme.desc: „Põgenemine Pretoriast" põhineb tõsielulool kahe poliitvangi vanglast põgenemisest. Põnev võidujooks ajaga leiab aset Lõuna-Aafrikas tormilistel apartheidi aegadel.

programme.title: Musketar
programme.desc: Alexandre Dumas romaani on taiendatud idamaisete nootidega. DArtagnan unistab liitumisest kuninga elitaarsete ihukaitsjate musketaridega ja leida mees, kes tappis tema vanemad.

programme.title: Lara Croft
programme.desc: Videomangus seiklev Lara Croft arkab ellu filmis, kus tal tuleb joosta võidu aja ja pahalastega, et saada uuesti enda kasutusse vagevad, iidsed esemed.

programme.title: Tomb Raider II: Lara Croft ja elu hall
programme.desc: Kartmatu hauakambrite ruustaja Lara Crofti teemalise kultusliku arvutimangu ekraniseering. Lara Croft otsib Pandora laegast ja astub vastu hiina kuritegeliku sundikaadi eestvedajale.

programme.title: Tõene lugu
programme.desc: Kui habistatud New York Timesi reporter Michael Finkel kohtub mõrvas suudistatud Christian Longoga, kes kasutab Finkeli identiteeti, muutub ta uurimistoo kassi ja hiire manguks. 2015

programme.desc: Magironimismatkal juhtub õnnetus ning parimad sõbrannad Becky ja Hunter jaavad lõksu 600 meetri kõrguse teletorni tippu.

programme.title: Kukkumine
programme.desc: Magironimismatkal juhtub õnnetus ning parimad sõbrannad Becky ja Hunter jaavad lõksu 600 meetri kõrguse teletorni tippu.

programme.title: Transformerid: Valjasuremine
programme.desc: Inimkond loob kaed pearahakutiga, et tabada Optimus Prime. Autobotid poorduvad mehaaniku pere poole, et abi saada.

programme.title: Kõuekargatus
programme.desc: 2055. aastal on ajas randamine tõeks saanud. Igauks saab nuud dinosaurustele kulla minna, kuid uks ettevaatamatu samm minevikus muudab taielikult tulevikku...

programme.title: Must valgus
programme.desc: Travis Block on valitsusametnik, kes puuab leppida oma tumeda minevikuga. Avastanud vandenõu USA kodanike vastu, satub ta FBI peadirektori sihikule.

programme.title: Musketar
programme.desc: Alexandre Dumas romaani on taiendatud idamaisete nootidega. DArtagnan unistab liitumisest kuninga elitaarsete ihukaitsjate musketaridega ja leida mees, kes tappis tema vanemad.

programme.title: Lara Croft
programme.desc: Videomangus seiklev Lara Croft arkab ellu filmis, kus tal tuleb joosta võidu aja ja pahalastega, et saada uuesti enda kasutusse vagevad, iidsed esemed.

programme.title: Tomb Raider II: Lara Croft ja elu hall
programme.desc: Kartmatu hauakambrite ruustaja Lara Crofti teemalise kultusliku arvutimangu ekraniseering. Lara Croft otsib Pandora laegast ja astub vastu hiina kuritegeliku sundikaadi eestvedajale.

programme.title: Rango
programme.desc: Kameeleon Rango elab oma hubases terraariumis ja unistab seiklustest. Ootamatult Pori-nimelisse linna sattudes tunneb vapper Rango end superkangelasena ja hakkab Metsiku Laane stiilis šerifiks.

programme.title: Isepaine vandekogu
programme.desc: Noore naise kohtuasjas relvatootja vastu naib võit olevat talle kindlustatud. Kuid selgub, et uhel inimesel on nii suur mõju vandekogu ule, et keegi ei julge enam protsessi tulemust ennustama hakata.

programme.title: Tõene lugu
programme.desc: Kui habistatud New York Timesi reporter Michael Finkel kohtub mõrvas suudistatud Christian Longoga, kes kasutab Finkeli identiteeti, muutub ta uurimistoo kassi ja hiire manguks. 2015

programme.title: Tõene lugu

programme.title: Klaarides arveid
programme.desc: Gangster Frankie Carveril diagnoositakse surmav haigus ja ta paaseb pikast vanglakaristusest. Tal on plaan karistada kõiki vanu kambajõmme, kes ta reetsid.

programme.title: Surematu 2
programme.desc: Jarg kõmufilmile MacLeodi klanni kuuluva surematu seiklustest. Kust on parit see salaparane klann ja kas seekord saadakse jagu diktaator Katanast? 1990

programme.title: Uus algus
programme.desc: Noor naislaulja kolib New Yorki lootuses kuulsaks saada, kuid peab pettuma, kuni armub majanduslikes raskustes plaaditoostuse juhti, kes aitab tal kuulsaks saada. 2013

programme.title: Võtaks vabalt
programme.desc: Neiu ja noormees puuavad hoida oma suhet rangelt pinnapealsena, kuid ei lahe kaua aega, kui nad taipavad, et soovivad mõlemad enamat.

programme.title: Zambesia
programme.desc: Pistrikupoeg kannatab uksinduse kaes. Ta unistab lindude paradiisilinnast Zambesiast. Sealt loodab ta leida ustavaid sõpru, põnevaid seiklusi ja oma unistuste taitumist.

programme.title: Ülemteener
programme.desc: Tõsielul põhinev film raagib ulemteenrist Cecil Gainesist, kes tootas Valges Majas kaheksa erineva presidendi alluvuses. 2013

programme.title: Paljajalu Pariisis
programme.desc: Fiona on esimest korda elus Pariisis, et aidata luhinagelikku tadi Marthat. Jargneb rida katastroofe, milles enamasti on osaline kodutu mees Dom, kes suhtleb ja valjendab ennast taiesti ilma filtrita.

programme.title: Põgenev pruut
programme.desc: Kuuniline ajakirjanik on leidnud põneva teema — pruudi, kes jatab juba neljanda peigmehe altari ees maha. Kas see on hirm või labimõeldud kattemaks? Et selgust saada, ruttab ta Maggiega kohtuma. 1999

programme.desc: Kolm vaga erinevate vaadetega peategelast peavad koos uurima massimõrva. Igauhel on oma isiklik põhjus politseitood teha, kuid eesmark on uks - võidelda kurjuse ja ebaõiglusega.

programme.desc: Psuhholoog asub toole poisiga, kes pidi end aarepealt surnuks kukkuma, ning satub salaparasesse maailma, mis paneb proovile fantaasia ja reaalsuse piirid.

programme.title: Locke
programme.desc: Tom Hardy sooloesinemine. Peategelase elus on kõik paigas: too, armastatud pere ja raudsed põhimõtted. Üks telefonikõne lukkab tema elu harjumusparasest rutmist valja ja sunnib gaasi põhja suruma.

programme.title: Vaike merineitsi
programme.desc: Kuri nõid kasutab ara nakineiu naiivsust ja roovib ta hinge. Paasta võiks neiu vaid tõeline armastus, mida ta kohtab noore muinasjutuvestja naol.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue
programme.sub-title: Dr Amandas team lose a pangolin abused by wildlife traffickers, and we check on a trio of hedgehogs and tag along as the centres baboons and nyala antelopes get a change of scenery.
programme.desc: The team at the Lilongwe Wildlife Trust in Malawi in Africa are dedicated to rescuing and rehabilitating injured and orphaned animals, ensuring they get back into the wild where they belong.

programme.title: Outback Vet
programme.sub-title: Dr Katy has been given custody of two endangered Hawksbill turtles in Karratha - we follow their journey back to the sea; Ed and Dunc collect squid for their sustainable eating display in Ocean Park.
programme.desc: Meet Rick Fenny, a 40-year career veterinarian; he regularly embarks on a round trip across Western Australia to visit remote clients, working with animals in some of the most hostile conditions.

programme.title: Wild LatAm
programme.sub-title: The desert of Chile is the driest in the world, but its marine currents are thought to be the richest on the planet; we come across Andean flamingos, burrowing owls, and the Fabians lizard.
programme.desc: A vibrant portrait of the biodiverse habitats in South America; inhabitants range from large to small, from colourful to perfectly camouflaged, and from the lone hunter to thousand-strong hordes.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.sub-title: Julian is called to an emergency on Tom Stockils farm and Peter removes an ominous looking lump for boxer dog Boot; this brings back bittersweet memories for Peter of his own beloved boxer Alf.
programme.desc: Skeldales team have a real passion for animals; with a clientele that rarely has insurance, animal welfare always comes before profit together with an extra dose of tender loving care.

programme.sub-title: An emotional emergency for Peter at a friends farm; Steves wife is seriously ill, and now her favourite sheeps life is in the balance. Julian tries to remove an abscess on Karine the alpacas chin.
programme.desc: Skeldales team have a real passion for animals; with a clientele that rarely has insurance, animal welfare always comes before profit together with an extra dose of tender loving care.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs Pride
programme.sub-title: Join Julz on a ZCP lion-collaring mission, go fishing with scout Simon, study mealtime pack hierarchy and witness a heartbreaking vigil for a badly-injured Kakumbi pup.
programme.desc: Cameraman Julz Braatvedt returns to the South Luangwa National Park to see the Kakumbi, Manzi and Kakuli packs back in action alongside lions, warthogs, buffalo, leopards, elephants and hyenas.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs Pride
programme.sub-title: Head back to the den with the Kakumbi - who are mourning the loss of two pups - and chance upon a hyena lair and a lion pride trying to take down a buffalo.
programme.desc: Cameraman Julz Braatvedt returns to the South Luangwa National Park to see the Kakumbi, Manzi and Kakuli packs back in action alongside lions, warthogs, buffalo, leopards, elephants and hyenas.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue

programme.desc: The team at the Lilongwe Wildlife Trust in Malawi in Africa are dedicated to rescuing and rehabilitating injured and orphaned animals, ensuring they get back into the wild where they belong.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack
programme.sub-title: Theres a shock in the borderlands where the Stork Colony pack roams, Vultures, elephants, baboons, and hyenas make for noisy neighbours for the Manzi pack, and the Kakuli pack goes missing.
programme.desc: Wildlife cameraman Julz Braatvedt visits the South Luangwa National Park in eastern Zambia to follow three wild dog packs for six weeks during the dry season.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.sub-title: Julian meets two-year-old Zac and his hedgehog, who needs surgery on her foot, and Lorraine brings her dog Corbin - who has a lump thats causing him pain when he walks - to see Peter at Skeldale.
programme.desc: Skeldales team have a real passion for animals; with a clientele that rarely has insurance, animal welfare always comes before profit together with an extra dose of tender loving care.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.sub-title: Worried about a lump on her leg, Mark has brought Border Terrier Annie to the surgery to see Julian; Peter heads out to sheep farmer Roland Norris, whos worried about one of his breeding rams.
programme.desc: Skeldales team have a real passion for animals; with a clientele that rarely has insurance, animal welfare always comes before profit together with an extra dose of tender loving care.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.sub-title: Peter heads to a local farm where Bernie the boar is strangely off his food, rescue dog Hector requires eye surgery, and Julians at Rodney Sheards farm to treat a couple of his rams.
programme.desc: Skeldales team have a real passion for animals; with a clientele that rarely has insurance, animal welfare always comes before profit together with an extra dose of tender loving care.

programme.title: Europes Wilderness
programme.sub-title: In the Bialowieza National Park in Poland is the last primeval forest of Europe; here lives the only European bison species. In untouched nature, we get to know their herd life.
programme.desc: We present six of the largest, rarest and fastest animals in Europe; how does climate change affect them, and how do they defend their habitat against human influence?

programme.title: Europes Wilderness
programme.sub-title: Europe is home to almost a million moose; west of the picturesque Miosa Lake, Norways largest lake, begins the moose territory, where we get to know the animal and its peculiarities.
programme.desc: We present six of the largest, rarest and fastest animals in Europe; how does climate change affect them, and how do they defend their habitat against human influence?

programme.title: Danube Fantasy
programme.desc: Filmmaker Braňo Molnár creates an emotional portrait of the Danube river, a home to hundreds of species of plants and animals that has witnessed drastic changes in recent years.

programme.title: Hooves in the Wind
programme.desc: This documentary portrays the non-traditional and one-of-a-kind breeding of horses in natural conditions on the Muránska plateau in Slovakia as we follow the people taking care of them.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack
programme.sub-title: Theres a shock in the borderlands where the Stork Colony pack roams, Vultures, elephants, baboons, and hyenas make for noisy neighbours for the Manzi pack, and the Kakuli pack goes missing.
programme.desc: Wildlife cameraman Julz Braatvedt visits the South Luangwa National Park in eastern Zambia to follow three wild dog packs for six weeks during the dry season.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack
programme.sub-title: Julz discovers lions in Manzi territory and is relieved when he finds the dogs safe, a brave puku antelope foils a Kakuli pack hunt, and the Stork pack recovers after losing a pup.
programme.desc: Wildlife cameraman Julz Braatvedt visits the South Luangwa National Park in eastern Zambia to follow three wild dog packs for six weeks during the dry season.

programme.title: River Monsters
programme.sub-title: Jeremy returns to Australias deadly Fitzroy River on his toughest quest yet - to catch the Glyphis shark, one of the worlds rarest fish. It is so elusive that it was only discovered very recently.
programme.desc: Extreme angler Jeremy Wade is on the hunt for freshwater fish with a taste for human flesh. Using forensic methods, Jeremy illustrates to the viewer how these river monsters are constructed to kill.

programme.title: Gladiators
programme.sub-title: The dry season is tightening its grip on a small watering hole on the great savannah of southern Africa; here a group of gladiators - big and small - are being drawn into dangerous proximity.
programme.desc: There are animals born to fight and destined to face their foe across the planet; armed with weaponry, guile and tactics, these gladiators are prepared for battle. Only champions will reign supreme...

programme.desc: Wildlife cameraman Julz Braatvedt visits the South Luangwa National Park in eastern Zambia to follow three wild dog packs for six weeks during the dry season.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack
programme.sub-title: Its Julzs last week; an encounter with lions scatters the Stork pack, Julz spots the Kakuli puppies feeding on a puku carcass, and the Manzi pack fight a warthog by the Luangwa River.
programme.desc: Wildlife cameraman Julz Braatvedt visits the South Luangwa National Park in eastern Zambia to follow three wild dog packs for six weeks during the dry season.

programme.title: Gladiators

programme.title: Wonders of Mexico
programme.sub-title: The countrys driest region, northern Mexico is dominated by two great deserts called the Sonoran and Chihuahuan; as you travel west the conditions get hotter, drier, and more challenging.
programme.desc: This documentary series reveals Mexicos astonishing wildlife, landscape and culture as we pay a visit to the ancient temples of the Maya, the Sierra Madre, and the Sonoran and Chihuahuan deserts.

programme.title: Patagonia: Earths Secret Paradise
programme.sub-title: We follow the path of the relentless wind from the Andes peaks sweeping east through Patagonias desert and discover a world of maras, penguins, and baby guanacos that are Patagonias very own camels.
programme.desc: This three-part series discovers the surprising stories of the unusual wildlife and the people that survive in epic Patagonian landscapes of volcanoes, glaciers, desert and treacherous oceans.

programme.title: A Year on Planet Earth
programme.sub-title: Winter has begun as the Northern Hemisphere freezes; life is at its hardest with less solar energy, and the Arctic sun has set and wont return until the spring.
programme.desc: We journey around the Sun in this series and witness the incredible strategies that animals use to cope with every season in their constantly changing worlds.

programme.title: A Year on Planet Earth
programme.sub-title: Transformation is enormous as the Northern Hemisphere starts to face the suns rays in March; spring is a season of opportunity as the great melt begins and new life erupts.
programme.desc: We journey around the Sun in this series and witness the incredible strategies that animals use to cope with every season in their constantly changing worlds.

programme.desc: The team at the Lilongwe Wildlife Trust in Malawi in Africa are dedicated to rescuing and rehabilitating injured and orphaned animals, ensuring they get back into the wild where they belong.

programme.sub-title: An old leopard queen is dead; when Thandi, the new queen, discovers the young cubs left behind, the fight for survival and for the crown of Djuma is on.
